name: Quattro Pro for DOS Spreadsheet File
summary: Learn about .WKQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WKQ files are similar to .WQ1 and .WQ2 files, which are also used to store spreadsheets by Quattro Pro for DOS. These extensions are more commonly associated with Quattro Pro for DOS than WKQ files.

description: A WKQ file is a spreadsheet file created by Quattro Pro for DOS, a program used to develop spreadsheets in DOS. It contains one or more pages of data stored in cells along a grid of rows and columns.
